name: Kill 3 Goblins
info: Goblins have been ruining all my walks outside town. I will pay to have some of them taken out.

name: Find a Death Scroll
info: I am in desperate need of a Death Scroll. I fancy a girl, but her father has forbade our union.

name: Kill a Vicious Slime
info: A Vicious Slime has destroyed all my crops. Take it out and I will reward you handsomely.
